replies.body:
AW HELL NAW, DELLRON
FEAR NOT DRAGOON IT IS I, THAT ONE GUY THAT RHYMES BUT HASN'T BEEN AT A SALE FOR A WHILE 
Uh, now what?
Story time, kids .
*Whispers* Ahaha yes, that'll distract people long enough for lightdragoon to reclaim his throne

A Flaw in the Code Part 8
Come one, come all. Summoners please hear.
The truth about Riot is finally clear
But first to understand, realize, comprehend
I must say the beginning, the middle, then end

Inside that house, the group found it hard
To take in the big golden musical bard
Jax, Garen and Yasuo were there too
And Yasuo said what he thought they should do

But before he began one of the three said
“Why do you five champs not want us three dead?”
This time it was Jax who spoke up to say
“Because of you three and the lore that you made”

Whatever you write in our lore becomes true
That’s why the evil champs all want to kill you
Champs from Zaun, Noxus and Bilgewater feel
The urge to plunder, murder and steal

“We’re from places of good and justice, you see?
We strive for balance and hope to succeed
But us eight are alone because of those fiends
Ryze captured our friends by dastardly means

We barely escaped, now we’re all that’s left
Now to restore what’s normal, we all face a test”
And so they went out, to blaze a new trial
My friend, I will see you nest Summoner’s Sale


Hey Riot..."Restore what's normal" on a completely unrelated note, how bout that new HUD?



http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-0717-0720 
aaand here's the last part of the story

_(No lightdragoon story, nows my chance. He is weak and i can take over. Quick, think of something funny. uhhh, uhhh. BARD, yes. everyone thinks bard is a joke.)_

{{champion:75}} "Darned players aren't buying enough Bilgewater stuff. Oh i know, who do they hate to play against the most? Teemo, lee sin, darius, tryndamere? Sounds good. Lets put some of them on sale. That will teach them to not buy bilgewater stuff."

{{champion:267}} "Isn't it counter productive to make the players angry about the sales?"

{{champion:75}} "NO NAMI! Listen to me, i am Corporate Nasus and i know whats best. You will understand one day when you are older."

{{champion:421}} "Fair lady Rek'sai jumping in. I have to say, you have done a fine job here Corporate Nasus. Glad at least one of our employees isn't on our, wish we could fire list. I am going to need you to go to Bilgewater with everyone though."

{{champion:75}} "Hmmm, can i get payed overtime?"

{{champion:421}} "But of course, not only that but we will also pay for the whole trip and anywhere you eat. Feel free to browse the finest food available."

{{champion:31}} "My fair lady, i have brought you the head of that guy who made a map of your home. Please accept this offering and take me back."

{{champion:75}} "Nuh uhhh, no love triangles in my office, get out Cho."

{{champion:72}} **"HEY, YOU GET AWAY FROM MY GIRL. SHE WANTS ME, GENTLEMAN SKARNER, NOT YOU, GENTLEMAN CHO'GATH"**

{{champion:75}} **"I SAID NO LOVE TRIANGLES!!!!"**

{{champion:432}} **"♬♬♬♬"**

{{champion:75}} **"OH, WHAT IS HE DOING HERE. IS THIS SOME KIND OF JOKE!"**

_(Oh no, lightdragoon's power is stronger than i thought. It is already returning. I can only get this story out in his absence. Back to the free rotation i gooooooooooooooo)_

Can I have a chance at a story.

I'll just wait for the next skin and patch note then. By the way what is the next skin?

{{champion:111}} *shows picture*

No, not him it can't be.
Lol {{champion:75}} {{item:3751}} Love triangles.
should have been corporate mundo.

Corporate Mundo runs the whole building, he doesn't do just the sales anymore. He smarter than most, need job where all can appreciate him, without him company would surely fail. Corporate Nasus has taken his job of doing the sales.
So Firefox Ahri is coming in August? {{champion:103}}
I guess :/ I've been waiting for it this whole month. Guess I gotta wait a couple more
She will most likely come out on the 07.31-08.03 sale. That was what happened to a couple champions and skins last month that I was excited about.
Think it's the same for the Goalkeeper Maokai?
The one skin I've been waiting all month for {{item:3070}}
Oh my gosh Panda teeemo <3 so cwute just gotta have him {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
But this skin is just to much though *-* I need it
Idk because I've literally been saving the last of my rp for that skin and like I'm so pissed
Same
I've been waiting for it!! D:

Hello everyone. I am taking a break today. I will have a one shot (that I am currently making changes and improvement on) ready on Thursday and then will begin the next story on Monday. 


So until then....ummm....bye.
It's ok LightDragoon :D You're always making these stories every time a sale comes out which must take a lot of effort into making, I'm sure a lot of us here don't mind if you take a break.
Yeah, bud. You definitely deserve a breather, bro. We'll look forward to your next story!

So the [July sales post](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule) said {{champion:92}}  would be on sale. Looking at all the champion sales that happened this month, she never was. :( I was looking forward to picking her up. I thought Riot would be on top of things like that.
